channel.title: Spatial Data on My Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Spatial Data on My Data Science

item.title: Ozone Levels
item.description: O3 is the main component of smog. CMAQ is a method to estimate the O3 levels in an area. This study explores the relationship between CMAQ measurements and O3 levels. We also construct a statistical model that deals with the spatial correlation between CMAQ values at different locations. R Code Python Code
